website_summaries.verdict: A good, affordable pair of kick pads that fit tightly over the hands for easy practice without extra weight.
pros: Quality padding provides a good amount of vibration absorption to protect the hands
The interior lining comfortably supports the hands so they do not tire out as quickly as with larger pads
cons: Offers less absorption with heavy or forceful kicks
Typically limited for light sparing or practice work

customer_reviews.title: Great, affordable tool for practicing kicks!
customer_reviews.text: We just started Taekwondo as a family and we love our new “clapper paddles.” They help us get in good practice outside of class, and we have improved significantly since we first began TKD, due in no small part to the fact that we have excellent home practice tools. They work just the same as the clapper paddles used in our dojang for a fraction of the price that they sell for in the local shop. I am extremely pleased with the durable construction of these clapper paddles and I am happy to have purchased them.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: good kick pads for TKD
customer_reviews.text: Synthetic leather had a slight oder, but wiped down with warm soap and water seamed to help, My 4 yr old loves it as it makes the snap sound if you kick hard enough. Doesn't break the bank, but I can see through heavy use, the synthetic leather will split or rip at the seams vs higher quality real leather, but the real leather is double the price.
customer_reviews.author: D. Kan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These are great for the price. They seem to be very well made. Time will tell if the stitching comes undone but so far it looks great. They did have a very strong odor to them. Perhaps in manufacturing them. So I sprayed them with Febreze several times and set them outside for a few days. Wanted to set at home to practice with. So many colors to choose from, but we picked red cuz it's easy to see, and then easier to kick!!
customer_reviews.author: Arie

customer_reviews.title: Meh🙄 not impressed.
customer_reviews.text: Still waiting for this thing to clap... The one at taekwondo ( different brand though) claps when we kick it so it’s not us. Functional for kicking but your kicks won’t be ‘applauded’.
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: Decent for Practice
customer_reviews.text: These are a little smaller than studio ones. There is some odor but does seem to weaken some over time. Overall, decent option to practice at home.
customer_reviews.author: sjc

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Great Price, Can’t Go Wrong
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my five-year old son who is currently learning Tae Kwon Do. These arrived on time and in great condition. We’ve gotten some great practice sessions in with these pads and they seem like they’ll be very durable and last a good deal of time. For the price, they were exactly what we hoped for and have no complaints at this time. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun W.

customer_reviews.title: These kicking paddles have been great! They were a great price and have really ...
customer_reviews.text: These kicking paddles have been great! They were a great price and have really held up well. Most, if not all, kicking paddles are a bit stiff to start with. These ones loosened up well and have been a great addition to my martial arts school inventory of training equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory A. Diloreto

customer_reviews.title: Strong and good Quality Pad
customer_reviews.text: it's a strong martial art practice pads. it can be adult and kids.
customer_reviews.author: MaxmReview

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Product came quickly and in great condition. Only upset was the chemical smell it had. I had to let it sit outside and air out before using them.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy

customer_reviews.title: Opt for better quality; this one is temporary
customer_reviews.text: The sides were cracking, and it doesn’t clap very well when kicked. But gives my 5 year old something to practice on, ordered one of better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: These are really great, very similar if not the same we use in class. The other reviews about being light weight may be true but like I said the ones we use in class are almost the same. I personally use these for a target more than anything and have my 9 year old son holding for me. My goal with these is to be accurate, not to see how hard I can kick. That said, I have put a lot into kicks with these and they have with stood some punishment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kinda flimsy but works for younger kids
customer_reviews.text: Much thinner and flimsy compared to the one my kid uses in his class. I am not complaining because it was only $10, I am sure it will work for quite a few years because he is 6 years old.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hoenigman

customer_reviews.title: ... for my daughter because she's in Taekwondo there exactly like the one at her school
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my daughter because she's in Taekwondo there exactly like the one at her school. So now she can practice it home as well. I definitely recommend these for anyone in martial arts.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Decent, but the wrist strap broke the first time ...
customer_reviews.text: Decent, but the wrist strap broke the first time I kicked it and it went flying out of my son's hand. Other than that they seem to be holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Wong

customer_reviews.title: Great price & quality
customer_reviews.text: Good for practicing kicks with my son for TKD - not flimsy, good quality and the price is great
customer_reviews.author: ArachnoBecca

customer_reviews.title: absolutely love it. great for training
customer_reviews.text: absolutely love it. great for training . Does exactly just what it says it will do. I would highly recommend these. Completely satisfied with this product. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Karen L. Kvasnicka

customer_reviews.title: Good.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty nice. Just got these a month ago. No problems.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas Fan

customer_reviews.title: Very Durable
customer_reviews.text: We practice everyday. These are very durable and will hold up
customer_reviews.author: Deann W.

customer_reviews.title: well made
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. This takes a beating daily and has held up wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Yule

customer_reviews.title: No smell
customer_reviews.text: I checked the reviews and I was ready for the smell but when I got mine had no I smell
customer_reviews.author: ghmok

customer_reviews.title: BreaDeep 2pcs Red
customer_reviews.text: I got these so I can help my granddaughter practice her Taekwondo moves. They appear to be very nice quality!
customer_reviews.author: Shelly M. Spears

customer_reviews.title: Nice pads
customer_reviews.text: Good quality pads. Will buy again when I wear these out.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Clark

customer_reviews.title: Very strong, durable, and affordable. As a ...
customer_reviews.text: Very strong ,durable ,and affordable .As a boxer and self defense instructor ,I approve fully @zachthetrainer and Zachthetrainer.com
customer_reviews.author: Zach The Trainer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool but you have to punch very hard and ...
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cool but you have to punch very hard and accurately to get the cool snapping sound. Our 6 year old boy only gets it once in a while.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Nice kicking pads that my son loves
customer_reviews.text: Nice kicking pads that my son loves! The smell is not nearly as bad as some make it sound and goes away over time.
customer_reviews.author: M Gutwein

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like using these you practice with my son. Its well made and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Yesenia M.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted. They are strong and withstand the kicks and punches. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lolita

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gave to grandson as gift, works well for practice. Well made, not a toy.
customer_reviews.author: picker

customer_reviews.title: but overall really good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I used to teach martial arts for 10 years. In comparison, the pads are a little lightly built, so the spine may break over time, but overall really good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob L.

customer_reviews.title: Nice for practicing aim for kicks
customer_reviews.text: Great kick pads for taekwondo home training for my kids. I’ve thrown a couple hard punches too, and it’s held up well!
customer_reviews.author: Andreas Schonger

customer_reviews.title: Okay, but small and don't make the cool sound...
customer_reviews.text: They are much smaller than the ones my kids were used to at their taikwondo place. They also don't make the "bang" noise that the bigger ones make.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey

customer_reviews.title: Cheapest thing i ever purchase
customer_reviews.text: It did not last long.my daughter used it in class three times and it torn to pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase! Good quality pads
customer_reviews.text: Excellent purchase! Good quality pads. Don't bother buying the single target pad unless you're just needing it for a replacement. I use these to train my sons TKD, & they're precisely what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: HeckleHelix

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, but not very well-made
customer_reviews.text: These seem to work well enough and the kids enjoy the satisfying cracking sound they make when struck properly, BUT, the straps ripped off after only a few uses.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Solid sparring paddle, arrives quickly and is a good value for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Solid sparring paddle with a good price. There is a good pop sound when kicked correctly at high velocity, and a decent pop sound with less accuracy or less power.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good, but pads don't hit back.
customer_reviews.text: They do the job. Kids kick them to hear the nice pop. There are no inside cups to exaggerate the noise, but that's not necessary. I think the build will have them last a few years.
customer_reviews.author: christopher

customer_reviews.title: A pair of the kicking pads was in the description ...
customer_reviews.text: A pair of the kicking pads was in the description.However, when I received the package there was only one kicking pad inside.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Epps

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Took a couple hits to break them ...
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Took a couple hits to break them in. Funny off gassing smell fresh out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: E. Lord

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase on Amazon so far. Im having so much fun with my daughters
customer_reviews.author: Junhee Cho

customer_reviews.title: good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to train with my daughter, very durable, good buy!
customer_reviews.author: GolfAddict

customer_reviews.title: Strong odor
customer_reviews.text: Boy do these smell. Leaving them outside and hope that they air out after a couple of days.
customer_reviews.author: Dlei

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just like the ones the kids use in Taekwondo. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: J. Doorly

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: My kids kicks have gotten stronger with practice using these pads. Nice and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Jefferys

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I expected. They are not the same ...
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I expected. They are not the same size as the ones used at the Tae Kwon do studio.
customer_reviews.author: Janine

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids love them. I'm glad they drive there mom nuts ...
customer_reviews.text: Grandkids love them. I'm glad they drive there mom nuts with them. Man can they kick the heck out of them.
customer_reviews.author: Bry I'm not a robot

customer_reviews.title: They are durable and just like the ones my sons uses at taekwondo
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what we were hoping to find. They are durable and just like the ones my sons uses at taekwondo.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are very durable pads that have held up very well.
customer_reviews.author: steven cagle

customer_reviews.title: Quality for the price! Don't smell bad like some reviews claim
customer_reviews.text: Quality for the price, don't smell at all like some of the reviews say. Shipping was on time and quick
customer_reviews.author: Morahan97

customer_reviews.title: Fraying strap
customer_reviews.text: A little disappointed. After 1 use the strap is fraying on one of the paddles.
customer_reviews.author: Martina Morton

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't make any clapping sounds. Too tough.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't clap. Too tough. Printing smudged. Very strong smell of chemical that stayed for several days (that's a clear warning already there). First use my kid immediately doesn't like it. Item returned promptly.
customer_reviews.author: pharmie

customer_reviews.title: ... our nieces 8th birthday and she couldn't have been happier!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for our nieces 8th birthday and she couldn't have been happier!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Stranak

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: A nice fairly priced item perfect for a young beginner in taekwondo or any martial arts
customer_reviews.author: Mike

product_meta.title: BREADEEP Taekwondo Kick Pads, Durable Kicking Target Pads for TKD Karate Martial Arts Strike Training
feature_bullets: ✔EFFECTIVE EQUIPMENT FOR PRACTICING: This target with double sides ideal design is a best choice for Taekwondo (or other Martial Arts) fans practicing high and low kicks,enhance your spped,accuracy and strength.
✔DOUBLE KICKING PAD DESIGN: It consists of the two pcs Target leaf,when you kick it there will be snapped sound which may interest your kids.
✔WRIST GRIP DESIGN: Which can stop the karate kicking target from dropping.
✔DURABLE MATERIAL & EASY TO CLEAN:The outside of the taekwondo pad is PU leather which makes it easy to clean,the inside of it is high elastic compression sponge provide the elastic the pad need.
✔Size:15.35*7.48*1.97 inch. Package quantity:1 pcs or 1 pair. (as shown on the pictures)
